overview: Having passed the oral exam for the ENA entrance exam, Caroline, Matt, Abel, Laure and her brother Louis find themselves proudly on the benches of the most prestigious French higher education institution, determined to change the world. In this return to 1977, the majority and the presidency have been on the right for more than twenty years and those of the Voltaire promotion swear to change from the inside a system which they consider unequal and obsolete.
